author: Elizabeth Winkler
title: Dick’s Stuns Its Critics in an Upset
text:
It turns out that Dick’s Sporting Goods doesn’t need guns to prop up its business after all.
After the sports retailer announced in February that it would stop selling assault-style rifles in its stores after a Parkland, Fla., high-school shooting left 17 people dead, investors worried that sales would suffer. In March, Chief Executive Ed Stackacknowledged that the decision “wouldn’t be positive from a traffic and sales standpoint.”
...
